nodes.text: Blue Two was the callsign used by the second member of Blue Squadron.
Clone trooper pilot "Axe" flew as Blue Two during the Battle of Ryloth.
During the lead up to the Galactic Civil War, Torius Chord flew as Blue Two for the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
During the Battle of Jakku, a member of 77 Squadron (which flew as Blue Squadron in that battle) flew under the callsign.
During the Battle of Starkiller Base, the Resistance pilot Yolo Ziff flew as Blue Two. Stomeroni Starck served as Blue Two, and later participated in the evacuation of D'Qar.
